Protocols/RVS_GTServiceDelegate.html#/s:.name: gtService(_:errorEncountered:)
Protocols/RVS_GTServiceDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: Called when an error is encountered by a single service.

Protocols/RVS_GTServiceDelegate.html#/s:.name: gtService(_:dicoveredCharacteristic:)
Protocols/RVS_GTServiceDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: Called when a new characteristic has been added to the service.

Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDriver(_:errorEncountered:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when an error is encountered by the main driver.

Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDriver(_:peripheralDiscovered:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when a peripheral is discovered, and before a device instance is instantiated.

Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDriver(_:newDeviceAdded:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when a device has been added and instantiated.

Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDriver(_:deviceWillBeRemoved:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when a device is about to be removed.

Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDriverStatusUpdate(_:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called to indicate that the driver’s status should be checked.

Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDevice(_:errorEncountered:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when an error is encountered by a single device.

Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDeviceWillBeRemoved(_:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when a device is about to be removed.

Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDevice(_:wasDisconnected:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when a device was disconnected for any reason.

Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.name: gtDevice(_:discoveredService:)
Protocols/RVS_GTDeviceDelegate.html#/s:1.abstract: Called when a device discovers a new service

Protocols/RVS_SequenceProtocol.html#/s:1.name: sequence_contents
Protocols/RVS_SequenceProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: The implementor is required to have an Array of Element (required by Sequence).

Protocols/RVS_SequenceProtocol.html#/s:1.name: makeIterator()
Protocols/RVS_SequenceProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: We just pass the iterator through to the Array.

Protocols/RVS_SequenceProtocol.html#/s:1.name: count
Protocols/RVS_SequenceProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: The number of characteristics we have. 1-based. 0 is no characteristics.

Protocols/RVS_DebugTools.html#/s:16RVS_G.name: isRunningUnitTests
Protocols/RVS_DebugTools.html#/s:16RVS_G.abstract: This is used to see whether or not we are running under unit tests. It is optional, and isn’t really supposed to be replaced.

Protocols/RVS_DebugTools.html.name: RVS_DebugTools
Protocols/RVS_DebugTools.html.abstract: This protocol is a junk drawer of vrious debug/testing tools.

Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html.name: RVS_GTDriverDelegate
Protocols/RVS_GTDriverDelegate.html.abstract: A delegate object is required to instantiate an instance of the driver class.

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy16RV.name: firstUppercased
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy16RV.abstract: This extension lets us uppercase only the first letter of the string (used for weekdays).

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy16RV.name: urlEncodedString
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy16RV.abstract: The following calculated property comes from this: http://stackoverflow.com/a/27736118/879365

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy16RV.name: index(of:options:)
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy16RV.abstract: This allows us to find the first index of a substring.

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy16RV.name: endIndex(of:options:)
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy16RV.abstract: This allows us to find the last index of a substring.

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy16RV.name: indexes(of:options:)
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy16RV.abstract: This returns an Array of indexes that map all the occurrences of a given substring.

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy16RV.name: ranges(of:options:)
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy16RV.abstract: This returns an Array of Index Ranges that map all the occurrences of a given substring.

Extensions/StringProtocol.html.name: StringProtocol
Extensions/StringProtocol.html.abstract: These are a variety of cool String extensions that add some great extra cheese on the pizza.

Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.name: sequence_contents
Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.abstract: This is an Array of our discovered characteristics, as represented by instances of RVS_GTCharacteristic.

Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.name: Element
Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.abstract: The element type is our characteristic class.

Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.name: owner
Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.abstract: this is the device instance that owns this service instance.

Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.name: delegate
Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.abstract: This is our delegate instance. It can be nil.

Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.name: discoverCharacteristics()
Classes/RVS_GTService.html#/s:16RVS_GTDr.abstract: Asks the device to discover all of its characteristics for our service.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: bluetoothNotAvailable
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: This is returned if the manager can’t power on.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: connectionAttemptFailed(error:)
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: This is returned if we cannot connect to the device.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: disconnectionAttemptFailed(error:)
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: This is returned if we cannot disconnect from the device.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.name: localizedDescription
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html#/s:16RV.abstract: The localized description is a simple slug that can be used to key a client-supplied message.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.name: sequence_contents
Classes/RVS_GTDriver.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.abstract: This is an Array of our discovered and initialized goTenna devices, as represented by instances of RVS_GTDevice.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html.name: Errors
Classes/RVS_GTDriver/Errors.html.abstract: These are the various errors that can be returned by this class.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.name: devices
Classes/RVS_GTDriver.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.abstract: This returns our discovered and initialized devices.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.name: indexOfThisDevice(_:)
Classes/RVS_GTDriver.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.abstract: This simply returns the 0-based index of the given device in our Array of devices.

Classes/RVS_GTDriver.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: centralManagerDidUpdateState(_:)
Classes/RVS_GTDriver.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: Called when the manager state changes. We simply use this to call the delegate to check the state.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.name: sequence_contents
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.abstract: This is an Array of our discovered and initialized goTenna services, as represented by instances of RVS_GTService.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.name: owner
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.abstract: this is the driver instance that owns this device instance.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.name: delegate
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.abstract: This is our delegate instance. It can be nil.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.name: isConnected
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.abstract: This manages and reports our connection. Changing this value will connect or disconnect this device.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.name: discoverServices()
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.abstract: Asks the device to discover all of its services.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.name: discoverAllCharacteristicsForService(_:)
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/s:16RVS_GTDri.abstract: Asks the device to discover all of the characteristics for a given service.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: peripheral(_:didDiscoverServices:)
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: Called when we have discovered services for the peripheral.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: peripheral(_:didDiscoverCharacteristicsFor:error:)
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: Called when we have discovered characteristics for a service.

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.name: peripheral(_:didUpdateNotificationStateFor:error:)
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html#/c:@CM@RVS_GTD.abstract: Called when a characteristic state has changed.

Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html#/s:16R.name: owner
Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html#/s:16R.abstract: This is the service instance that owns this characteristic instance.

Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html#/s:16R.name: value
Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html#/s:16R.abstract: Returns the value data for this characteristic.

Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html#/s:16R.name: sequence_contents
Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html#/s:16R.abstract: This is a simple direct access to the characteristic descriptors.

Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html.name: RVS_GTCharacteristic
Classes/RVS_GTCharacteristic.html.abstract: This class implements a single discovered goTenna device (in peripheral mode).

Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html.name: RVS_GTDevice
Classes/RVS_GTDevice.html.abstract: This class implements a single discovered goTenna device (in peripheral mode).

Classes/RVS_GTDriver.html.name: RVS_GTDriver
Classes/RVS_GTDriver.html.abstract: This class implements the main skeleton of the driver API.

Classes/RVS_GTService.html.name: RVS_GTService
Classes/RVS_GTService.html.abstract: This class implements a single discovered goTenna device (in peripheral mode).
